content: babies need a bit of extra help regulating their body temps when they re little this sweater is the perfect addition for those cool spring days or breezy summer nights **finished sizes ** 2 sizes 0 - 6 months 6 - 12 months **yarn ** #3 dk/light worsted - 250 yds/300 yds - 3 oz /3 5 oz **samples used ** paintbox yarns simply dk **crochet hook ** size 7 4 5 mm **notions ** yarn needle **difficulty ** advanced beginner
